channel.title: No internen connection Anbox
channel.description: Hi! After installing Anbox on the latest version Whonix encountered a lack of Internet on the Anbox container . I think the problem is that the Anbox bridges don't work correctly. Does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: No internen connection Anbox
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
darkrole:

“sudo systemctl mask Whonix-firewall”

That lowercase w not W.
Fixed in wiki just now.

Read full topic

item.title: No internen connection Anbox
item.dc:creator: darkrole
item.description:
I understand where the issue is. The issue connected with this section http://www.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/Anbox#Anbox_Configuration . After reboot firewall turn on as usual and you need to make this command “sudo systemctl mask Whonix-firewall” again before turn on Anbox. Is it right way?

Read full topic

item.title: No internen connection Anbox
item.dc:creator: darkrole
item.description:
Hi! After installing Anbox on the latest version Whonix encountered a lack of Internet on the Anbox container . I think the problem is that the Anbox bridges don’t work correctly. Does anyone know how to fix this?

Read full topic
